info.name: DarkLink [2017 updated]
info.description: Spend more time connecting with peers, colleagues, clients, and following business leaders and organizations in the comfort of a dark theme for LinkedIn. This style is up to date and covers the parts of LinkedIn you use most.
info.additionalInfo: If you find anything not working or inconsistent with the rest of the site style, please contact me and I will do my best to fix the issue. If you do not provide specific details, I cannot fix the issue. Details like the page the issue occurred on, the portion of the page affected, etc.
